Articles.Content:
So I recorded a moon mission today. Right after I recorded I checked facebook and saw the Neil Armstrong had died. He was my hero when I was a wee lad and now I will never have a chance to meet him.

I would always talk to my friends about all the apollo missions and had the dream of meeting Neil Armstrong. Over the past few years this idea has faded in my mind but now that I know I can never meet him it brought a tear to my eye.

In this thread you can post your thoughts about the apollo missions or any other missions (even a ksp mission) for others enjoyment.

My mun landing:

Please use one of the many existing threads on this subject. We will be merging them all into one big Neil Armstrong thread tomorrow.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
